messages.subject: TheTigerandtheWolf (PMK YAOI FIC)
messages.msgSnippet: The story is in the Files section in the story archives Title: THE TIGER AND THE WOLF Source: Peacemaker Kurogane...remember this IS NOT RK SAITOU!
messages.messageBody:
The story is in the "Files" section in the "story archives"
Title: THE TIGER AND THE WOLF
Source: Peacemaker Kurogane...remember this IS NOT RK SAITOU!
Warnings: contains Yaoi situation, a little bit of violence and the
history of a woman special to Saitou (NOT TOKIO!)

I wrote the dream sequence a while ago and I just wrote the other
parts tonight. It's a one shot and not very long. Enjoy.
